targets.expr: (sum(delta(ironbank{network="$networks", param="tvl"}[1d])) or vector(0)) + (sum(delta(ironbank_own{network="$networks", param="tvl"}[1d])) or vector(0))

panels.description:
Ironbank Utilization
Percent of funds available to be lent / funds being used. Utilization = totalBorrows / (getCash + totalBorrows - totalReserves)
